title: Personal Blog
description: Personal blog is a place where I update hobbies or work that I am currently or done recently.
subDescription: This was one of the first Nuxt.js application I created with the help of a tutorial, I love the smooth and simplicity of Vue but Nuxt takes it a step further. I hope to continue with Vue/Nuxt and be fluent in the frameworks.

title: Budget Tracker
description: Budget Tracker is an application that will help you keep track with your spendings!  The best thing about this tracker is that it will work offline! Meaning if you do not have internet connection, you are still able to add or subtract funds and when you do have internet connection. The cached data will be transfered to the online database!

title: Workout Tracker
description: Workout Tracker is a tool that helps you keep track of your workout reps, sets, total amount of weight lifted and more! Workout tracker has a dashboard that will display your progress through out the different types of workouts either being resistance or cardio.

title: Simple Weather App
description: A weather app that scratching the surface of a weather application. It currently allows the user to search a city and it will show off the current weather.
subDescription: Future implements would be to add 7 day forcast, wind speed, and other weather related information

title: Burger
description: Burger is a burger ordering program. User enters what they want in the textarea and it will populate a spot in ordered: section, when the user clicks devour it, the burger order will be sent over to devoured. Thus completeing the application.
